level1: ^Ehh... It's just obvious you're out of place here.
^This is my place of confinement, a sort of punishment, as it were.
^What did you do to deserve this?
^Nothing, really... I was in the wrong place at the wrong time.
^That would be just wonderful, my young lady!
^You can press Ctrl to pick me up and the Left Mouse Button to throw me.
^Though you won't be able to jump with me, I've gained lot of weight sitting here.
^Just don't lose me on your way, for there is a task that we must fulfill.
